# candidates

**Instance Property**

The array of candidate objects previously set by [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSCandidateListTouchBarItem/setCandidates(_:forSelectedRange:in:)].

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var candidates: [CandidateType] { get }
```

## Populating the candidate list

- **setCandidates(_:forSelectedRange:in:)**: Sets an array of candidate objects to be displayed in the candidate list bar item.
- **attributedStringForCandidate**: A block that converts a candidate object into an attributed string for display in the candidate list item.
- **allowsTextInputContextCandidates**: A Boolean value that specifies whether a candidate list item displays candidates from text input providers.
